segments.text: I notice the quiet details in this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is absorbed in her task, towel wrapped around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling out, wetting the floor and her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so unaware, lost in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me think of how we miss the important things sometimes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool stretches high for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is precarious, the stool unsteady beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, her hand open in hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little secret feels bittersweet in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, so unlike the tension inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang for what could go wrong here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of fragile everyday moments.
segments.speaker: PAR
